m_szDocTitle: Mitsubishi Outlander PHEV Production Doubling With Fire Investigation Resolved | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Mitsubishi Outlander PHEV Production Doubling With Fire Investigation Resolved This article was originally published on EV Obsession . Production of the Mitsubishi Outlander plug-in hybrid electric vehicle (PHEV) is set to double now that the source of some fire-related issues has been identified. The Mitsubishi Outlander PHEV, which is produced in Japan, is going from 2,000 produced a month to 4,000 a month. The highly anticipated Mitsubishi Outlander PHEV is supposed to hit the US market in 2014. Sales started in Japan in January 2013 . â€œIn March, the company halted Outlander PHEV production
